title: Verify User Profile Update
objective: To verify that users can successfully update their profile information
preconditions: User is logged into the platform

test_steps.expected_result: Profile page loads with current information displayed

test_steps.action: Update First Name: Change from 'John' to 'Jonathan'

test_steps.expected_result: Phone number field accepts format, validates correctly

test_steps.action: Attempt to enter invalid phone format: '123'
test_steps.expected_result: Validation error: 'Please enter a valid phone number'

test_steps.action: Correct phone number to valid format
Upload new profile picture (2MB JPG file)

test_steps.expected_result: Saving indicator appears, then success message displayed

test_steps.action: Verify changes are reflected in profile view
test_steps.expected_result: Updated name, phone, and profile picture displayed

test_steps.action: Verify changes persisted: Logout and login again
test_steps.expected_result: After re-login, profile still shows updated information

test_steps.action: Verify audit log records the changes
test_steps.expected_result: Profile changes logged with timestamp and fields modified

test_execution_history.notes: Profile update smooth, validation working well

notes: Test with various image formats and sizes. Test concurrent updates from multiple sessions.
